overview: Daniel M. Cain co-founded CB Health Ventures after co-founding and managing Cain Brothers. Since its formation in 1982, Cain Brothers has established a leading role in financing and advising the provider sector of the healthcare industry. Prior to forming Cain Brothers, Mr. Cain was Vice President and Manager of The Healthcare Finance Group at Solomon Brothers, and served as a member of the management team of Blyth Eastman Dillon’s Healthcare Group with Mr. Blume.

degrees.subject: Business Administration
degrees.institution: Columbia University Graduate School of Business
